Class Monster

java.lang.Object
gamePackages.entities.Entity
gamePackages.entities.Monster
Direct Known Subclasses:
Clam_Boss, Clam_Monster
public class Monster extends Entity
Represents a monster entity in the game, extending the base `Entity` class. The `Monster` class inherits the attributes and behaviors of `Entity` and introduces additional properties specific to monsters, such as a name and a distance threshold (`epsilonDistance`).

  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster()
      Default constructor for creating an uninitialized monster.

    • Monster

      public Monster(String spritePath, float posX, float posY, int width, int height, float maxHealth)
      Constructs a monster with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      spritePath - The path to the sprite representing the monster.
      posX - The X-coordinate of the monster's position.
      posY - The Y-coordinate of the monster's position.
      width - The width of the monster.
      height - The height of the monster.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the monster. This constructor initializes the monster's properties by calling the parent `Entity` constructor.

  • Method Details

    • setMonsterName

      public void setMonsterName(String monsterName)
      Sets the name of the monster.
      Parameters:
      monsterName - The name to assign to the monster.

    • getMonsterName

      public String getMonsterName()
      Gets the name of the monster.
      Returns:
      The name of the monster.

    • monsterRender

      public void monsterRender(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, float delta, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
      Renders the monster by calling the base entity rendering method.
      Parameters:
      batch - The SpriteBatch used to draw the monster.
      delta - Time elapsed since the last frame, used for animation timing.
      camera - The camera used to render the monster's perspective.

    • movToTarget

      public void movToTarget(float delta, Entity target, PathfindingManager PathfindingMap)
      Moves the monster towards a target entity using pathfinding and updates its position.
      Parameters:
      delta - Time elapsed since the last frame, used for movement calculations.
      target - The target entity the monster is moving toward.
      PathfindingMap - The pathfinding manager used to calculate the movement path.

    • movmentHandler1

      protected void movmentHandler1(float delta, float targetX, float targetY)
      Handles movement logic to move the monster towards a target in the bottom-left direction.
      Parameters:
      delta - Time elapsed since the last frame, used for movement calculations.
      targetX - The target X-coordinate.
      targetY - The target Y-coordinate.

    • movmentHandler2

    • UpdateToPlayerPosition

      public void UpdateToPlayerPosition(float delta, Entity target, PathfindingManager PathfindingMap)
      Updates the monster's position and movement state based on the player's location.
      Parameters:
      delta - Time elapsed since the last frame, used for movement calculations.
      target - The player entity the monster is tracking.
      PathfindingMap - The pathfinding manager used for movement calculations.

      public Monster deepCopy()
      Creates a deep copy of the monster with the same attributes and animations.
      Returns:
